remarks: According to ~ df-subc , the subcategories ` ( Subcat `` C ) ` of a category ` C ` are subsets of the homomorphisms of ` C ` ( see ~ subcssc and ~ subcss2 ).  Therefore, the set of field homomorphisms is a "subcategory" of the category of division rings.  (Contributed by AV, 20-Feb-2020.)  (New usage is discouraged.)

fldhmsubcOLD.f $e |- F = ( r e. D , s e. D |-> ( r RingHom s ) ) $.
fldhmsubcOLD $p |- ( U e. V -> F e. ( Subcat ` ( ( RingCatOLD ` U ) |`cat J ) ) ) $.
